bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, 20" frame, rigid fork geo w/ low standover TT design, formed DT/TT, forged dropouts w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: Alloy straight blade, 1 1/8" Hi-Ten steerer,  w/ canti mounts
Alloy A-head, 4 bolt, 20 degree rise, 25.4mm clamp
Hi-Ten riser bar, 40mm rise, 10 degree back sweep, 6 degree up
Forged alloy arms, steel single ring w/ dual roller chainguide
Composite platform w/ reflectors, loose ball, 9/16"
Forged alloy, freewheel type, 32h, nutted axle
Specialized Nimbus, 20 x 1.5", 60TPI, wire bead, Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Nimbus, 20 x 1.5", 60TPI, wire bead, Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Kids Body Geometry, 1pc., 7mm rail w/ clamp
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
